text: I should mention now this is while using a java.util.logging xml file (file attached).  When viewing an XML file, if I click "focus on" on the left hand side tree dialog, it successfully only shows items in that section. But when I click right click and select ignore it continues showing all entries.

text: Fixed in svn 824604 - 'ignore' was only working if a logger was selected, ignore was also not ignoring sub-loggers
